item.description:
26 Chilton Street
Cambridge, MA 02138

"Il s'agit d'une maison rouge, la rue Chilton est perpendiculaire Ã 
Huron Avenue au niveau de Fresh Pond Market, Cambridge Trust bank and
Marimekko. There is a big clock there two. If you come from Concord
then you take a right on Chilton and my house is about the 4th or 5th
on the right.

It's on the bus line 72 from Harvard Square or a 15-min walk from
There. Taking Concord Av. to Huron Ave, take a left on Huron and then a
right on Chilton (there are some shortcuts but this is easier to
explain).

There is usually parking on my street or on Huron Ave or on adjacent
streets, also on the bank parking lot. On Huron it's meters so there
is no need for a permit."

Frederique
